thread.title: What would happen if Google was actually a guy?
thread.title_full: What would happen if Google was actually a guy?

author: Rutu Ladage
title: What would happen if Google was actually a guy?
text:
What would happen if Google was actually a guy? By Rutu Ladage on October 21, 2015 at 4:33 PM Comments 
There’s a million questions Google gets asked every day. All kinds of questions from the shape of the earth to the shape of Kim Kardashian. Google does your exam reports you. It creates your presentations. It makes you look pretty before the big date or tells you exactly what to wear at the prom. Google is your friend, your teacher, your mother, your guru, your everything. Google can give you answers in a jiffy or sometimes drive you up the wall if there are no answers. The search engine is brilliant – brilliant enough to put the smartest man on earth to shame. 
But the fact remains – Google is a thing. A search machine that you cannot see or feel. It does not have a mind of it’s own or it is not a human. But what if, Google in real life was a human? And more importantly, a guy. There have always been jokes circulated saying that Google is a woman as Google completes your sentences and gives you options before you even begin to type. You haven’t started saying something and bam! Google is there to complete it for you. But then, imagine, what if Google was actually a guy? A man outside whose office you’d line up to get all your answers to the most bizarre questions? 
[Read More: The great Indian love marriage takes a hilarious turn with Bang Baaja Baraat! ] 
Still dare to watch porn? And give yourself some action while doing so? Or check out disgusting, pictures or funny results? Perhaps you’d wish there was like a screen between you and the thy that you could call the ‘incognito mode’. Just what if… Google was a guy? 

  4:33 PM Topics:
